name: afastidioushat
text: Ray's commitment to this joke is impressive.

name: lastlarf
text:
I don't think it's a joke, I assume they are doing it to spare the kid's feelings.

At least I like to think Lie Bot is using his powers for good for once...

name: invidious
text: I just thought it was the only reasonable explanation as to how Bush got re-elected.

name: hardelicious
text: I would vote for phillipe over bush if he were running again.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Bush did not promise us puppies named Mr. Poopytime.  If he had, he would not have delivered them.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Obama should've named his new puppy Mr. Poopytime. It's really a lost opportunity.

name: ravindra108
text: Since Ray is in on it, I agree fully. Lie Bot may just be going along with it because it is a free opportunity to say some lies.

name: 7th_son
text: I just now figured out what the hell he was doing in that last panel.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Oh goddamn, me too. That brings this strip up at least a point.

name: stuart
text: Ray does not like to trot out this party trick very often at all.

name: mangtastic
text: Shiiiit, I thought it was a yo yo at first

name: sp1derbaby
text: It is Extreme Yoyo.

name: sweetlips
text: Wait, what's he doing?

name: wite_rabit
text: OH COME ON

name: sweetlips
text: Aren't his balls on the inside though?

name: aderas
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: vulpes-aurum
text: BOO TO THAT

name: haruspex
text: For science!

name: soticoto
text: Only when gymnasts speak.

name: flim
text: A comment left by flim was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, johnnybaverage, missbee, coke_hakola, apocowarg, karljw, tasteful, mawk, riotdejaneiro, cryztal, layzerblade, Wolfensti, glorify, kylank, Yossarian, dizneedave, mashisoyo, rudegrrl, purplehaze, zpa, dumase, Jhunter, trisha, barfighting, sneechles, Fermatprime, Sleaw, LordPretzel, Art-Vader, obipam, heartofoak, mikerotch6, ih8jonmayr, tripleG, luckypyjamas, lk, fmercury, logic, LaserBlade, peppill, Njury, anewcede, sid, Brosaurus, biznart, shortside40, gorrioncita, Wite_Rabit, zaer, smilebuddha, prowle4763, Oranjer, holly_golightly, nilehus, peterjoel, Mastronaut, ouroboros, Zinggy)

name: peterjoel
text: A comment left by peterjoel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mysterymeat1001, greenkoolayd, Art-Vader, mikerotch6, shortside40)

name: atticusonline
text: I find it hilarious how flim has 1 chubby and 7 lames whereas you have 7 chubbies and 1 lame... NO ONE FIX THIS IT IS BEAUTY.

name: laserblade
text: All you have to do is lame flim and chubby peterjoel, and the effect is consistent.

name: fermatprime
text:
GODDAMNIT IT'S WRONG SOMEONE LAME FLIM

(sorry, flim :-/)

name: soticoto
text: THORDAMNIT IT'S WRONG SOMEONE LAME ATTICUS

name: karljw
text: currently at 37/2, 2/37, as of 5/17/09. NO ONE MESS IT UP

name: atticusonline
text: omg i created something WITH MY WORDS

name: layzerblade
text: I helped!

name: dissembly
text: Yes but lames seem to randomly run out. You would have to lame flim first, otherwise you might end up trapped having chubby'd the one guy and then getting nothing but that stupid "Do something nice for a change" message. SCREW YOU ASSETBAR!!! I AM ALWAYS NICE QUITE OFTEN!!! LET ME LAME SOMEBODY JUST ONCE PLEASE!!!!!

name: johnnybaverage
text: I see people complaining about running out of chubbies all the time. This is the first I've seen someone complain about running out of lames. Are you Pat?

name: apocowarg
text: I  could not be more pleased that this is still going.

name: dusty
text: Its close to being 5/55,55/5

name: sp1derbaby
text: Acceptable losses , Philippe, acceptable losses.

name: petitegitan
text: A comment left by petitegitan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sirhan_duran, StoatLad, RBisme, Pigs)

name: dissembly
text: Dick Cheney is to Lie-Bot what the T-1000 is to Terminator.

name: nathanielperson
text: Ow.

name: julia
text: Each word puncuated by a jerk on the cord.  I knew there was a reason Beef imagined Ray with a leather mask.

name: closefriend
text: For the longest time, I thought that was a yo-yo, and then I was like, "Why is he jerking around a yo-yo to talk to Philippe? And why is it next to his jun--OH DEAR GOD WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT?!"

name: plezure
text: Mickey did shoot himself. The CIA and Larry King covered it up. See the A&E documentary.

name: choosebro
text: I heard that if you fold the Australian 20 dollar note in a certain way it shows a picture of Mickey shooting himself.

name: scraggg
text: Not to mention that every Jewish employee of the Walt Disney Company was mysteriously absent from work that day.

name: deancain29
text: Ray goes the extra mile for Philippe - he is a rad friend

name: rogergs
text: A comment left by rogergs was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, rudegrrl, Anderian, lux, fmercury, Xaxx)

name: stuart
text: It was a different Mr. Smuckles.

name: spinynorman
text: A comment left by spinynorman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rudegrrl, goocifer, amandulence)

name: apocowarg
text: Yes.

name: lastlarf
text: A comment left by lastlarf was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by robobogle, rudegrrl, jthompson, smilebuddha, STUART)

name: steerpike66
text: And even it it WAS full castration, which it wasn't, you don't lose your manly voice after your characteristics have already appeared.

name: skiddyfisk
text: Lie Bot does not lie for evil, he just lies to lie.

name: fermatprime
text: He is Chaotic Neutral. A poorly played Chaotic Neutral, to be sure (Lie Bot's as likely to jump off a bridge as cross it! Well, metaphorically), but Chaotic Neutral nonetheless.

name: zem
text: Ah, that clears things up. Thanks.

name: dasilodavi
text: Why must Ray encourage Lie Bot?

name: nilehus
text: Philippe is five. He needs the support at that age.

name: decagon
text:
This was the first Achewood I ever saw. I have never been more confused.

I thought Ray was Onstad's honest attempt at drawing Mickey Mouse. Who was for some reason yanking on his own testicles. Yeah.

name: zem
text: apparently i already chubbied this a year ago but i wanted to call more attention to it because i'm literally laughing out loud

name: thatcrazycommie
text: It always makes me giggle that Ray managed to get "IS A GREAT!" out in one breath.

name: apmihal
text: The first panel gave me hope, but the next panel shattered it.

name: rowboat
text: Lie Bot is his name and shattered hopes is his game.

name: vymora
text: Phillipe has hidden in his treehouse because he has lost the election; Lie Bot and Ray craft a plan to spare his feelings.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Wednesday Blogs

Onstad: Tense week

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Mr. Bear: Breakfast with Ekaterina (of sorts)

name: echidnaboy
text:
For some reason I wasn't really getting into Cornelius' Russian adventure, but this concluding entry is superb. My hat goes off to Mr. Onstad.

I can't believe I didn't read the blogs my first time through the archives; they're part of what makes Achewood so special.

name: i_love_kate
text: Mr. Bear's blog is always by far my favourite, and this wasn't one of the very rare disappointments. The idea of a Russian bar united in disgust at the prospect of improperly-consumed consomme thrickled my pinctum. Literally.

name: redzerostar
text: everytime i look at that first panel, i see the treehouse being supported by a huge, gaping mouth of some kind. ahh i cant stop seeing it.

name: direhaggis
text: That is hella inflamed testicle.

name: jjg
text: Ray's party tricks make me feel queasy

name: unsentletter
text: EEEEEEEEEEEEEE .

name: pogo
text: Let the mouse die!  Oh well.  (It must have been so cool to read this strip on the day of the actual election.)

name: mikestan
text: Oh. Dear...  GOD!

name: tangles
text: what is ray doing to himself in the last panel? dear lord, makes me think of bme pain olympics... do... not... want!

name: carlyle
text: It was a great-day for America- when this stip went-up.

name: implode
text:
I'll go out on a limb and guess that Ray does not sound anything like Mickey Mouse.

Unless of course you're a 5-year-old.

name: sarsbar
text: It takes a dedicated man to assault his left nut just to spare a kid's feelings.
